backend/main.mo: Defines booking, provider, rental, and user profile types with compare helpers, manages in‑memory maps, and exposes profile CRUD with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping branding‑related feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing branding changes, pages, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base variables and dark‑mode theme values and applies global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell defining the root element and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the application layout and routing for all pages including services, bookings, rentals, and provider flows.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied message with an icon and a button returning users to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading handling and query cache reset on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireLogi: Wraps protected content and prompts unauthenticated users with a login card using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Renders a status badge by mapping backend booking statuses to label/variant pairs.
Renders a text‑only EYEGIC brand mark as a link with responsive sizing for header or default variants.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and utility classes including container and spacing components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/BookingDetai: Displays detailed booking information with status, address, time, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/mobile-optic: Shows confirmation details for a mobile optician booking including status, reference, and summary fields.
Form for creating a mobile optician booking with service selection, details input, pricing calculation, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Lists the user's bookings with status, basic details, and navigation to booking detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/rentals/Rent: Displays a confirmation page for a completed rental booking, showing booking details, pricing, and navigation options.
Lets users book a rental item by selecting rental days and address, calculates price, and submits a booking.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/repairs/Repa: Shows confirmation for a submitted repair request with booking details and navigation buttons.
Allows users to submit a repair request with issue type, details, address, time, and optional photo, calculating price before submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, service list, and process steps with navigation to service routes.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderDash: Provider dashboard showing provider profile and service bookings with the ability to update booking statuses.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderOnbo: Form for new providers to register by entering personal info, service areas, availability, and offered services.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalItemDet: Displays detailed rental item info, pricing, availability, and features, with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalsCatalo: Shows a searchable, filterable catalog of rental items with category filtering and navigation to item details.
frontend/src/pages/services/MobileOptici: Presents the mobile optician service overview, features, and booking navigation.
Introduces the eyewear rentals service, highlighting benefits and linking to the rental catalog.
Describes repair services offered, showcases service features, and links to the repair booking page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom color variables, container settings, extended animations, shadows, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state and requirements for removing all logo images and replacing branding with bold EYEGIC text across the app.
